=====================================

### Tender Title
Ceilometer with Depolarization

### Tender Reference Information

* Government Tender Number: WS3768044705
* Solicitation Number: WS3768044705
* Department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Solicitation Date: Published on 2023-01-24
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-15T14:00:00 (Amended)

### Tender Description
Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires the supply and delivery of one (1) ceilometer with depolarization to Edmonton, Alberta.

### Tender Details

* Country: Canada
* Province: Alberta
* Description: Request for Proposal under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
* Contact Information:
  * Erin Kaiser
  * (SPAC/PSPC)
  * erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Important Note
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All supporting documents and bid submissions must be submitted by 2023-03-15T14:00:00 to be considered responsive.

You may refer to the published Ariba Discovery posting and Buyandsell for tender details. All documents are available at:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15215940?extsite=MTUyMTU5NDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Other Details
* UNSPSC Code: *77121501
* UNSPSC Code Description: Air quality management
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)
* Regions of Delivery: Alberta
* Contract Opening: The contract is expected to commence on 2023-01-31 and end on 2023-03-31. The contract status is expired.
